name: Crown Shaving After Shave Tonic
description:
Soothing & antiseptic after shave tonic contains:
Aqua, natural grain alchohol, essential oils of bay rum. With notes of tobacco, leather & barbers talc - A true barbershop.

name: JS SLOANE  High Gloss Top Coat
description:
High Gloss Top Coat
$22.00
High Gloss Top Coat is a very fine light arganoil to add shine and protection to any modern or vintage hairstyle. For the extra finishing touch to a perfectly neat hairstyle with a fresh scent. Can be used alone or to compliment the brilliantine as a excellent addition. Use sparingly when applying onto hair. This product can also be used for both men and women to control frizz and dryness.

name: JS SLOANE Heavy Weight Brillantine 4oz
description:
Heavyweight Brilliantine
$17.00
For harder to manage hair,this product has maximum control and will hold style in place. This superb old style and texture with fresh scent will wash out easy. Apply small amount to hand and rub on dry hair to style or blow dry hair, then add brilliantine and comb into desired style.

name: JS SLOANE Medium Weight Brillantine 4oz
description:
Mediumweight Brilliantine
$17.00
For shorter hair styles and that ultra neat look that
holds all day. This brilliantine is for the modern classic man with normal to finer hair. With a fresh clean scent, superb hold and control this brilliantine will wash out easy. Apply a small amount to hand and rub into dry hair to style or blow dry hair and comb into place.

name: Parker Safety Razor 42R
description: The Parker 42R is compatible with Gillette's Mach 3 razor blades. This razor has a metal handle for a sure grip..One Gillette Mach 3 blade is included

name: Parker Safety Razor 60R
description:
Butterfly Opening
Vintage Style Safety Razor, opening accommodates a double edge razor blade.

name: Suavecito Pomade Bay Rum Aftershave
description:
A bottle of old fashioned bay rum after shave! Get that great just out of the barber’s chair scent and feel when you splash some of this on your cheeks after a cool shave. Natural Bay Oil sooths and refreshes your skin after a shave with a small bite that is reminiscent of days now gone. Shake a generous amount onto your palms, pat hands together and apply to shaven area. Bringing back the tradition! Comes in a fine 4 oz. bottle!

Apply after using our fine Suavecito Shaving Crème.

4oz

name: Suavecito Pomade Vanashing Creme
description:
Menthol Vanishing Crème 

This is an amazing skin moisturizing agent and aftershave crème. It's natural ingredients work to help prevent skin rash and razor burn from shaving and make the skin feel smooth and ultra-soft! Just what you were looking for! Smooth this stuff on with your fingers and work it well into the skin. Remove excess as desired. Rich and Creamy, Natural Menthol and Mint, working in your favor! Comes in a huge 8 oz. tub! 

Apply after using our fine Suavecito Pomade Shaving Crème.

8oz

name: Suavecito Pomade Shaving Creme
description:
This is a rich and silky shaving crème that is an excellent way to prepare your beard or ‘stache for a close and pleasant shave. It will soften the whiskers for a smooth glide and comfortable shave that leaves your skin feeling clean, refreshed and nourished. Wash face then gently rub this fine shaving crème with your fingers into beard. NO BRUSH NEEDED. Cleanses without the harshness of soap! Comes in a huge 8 oz. tub!

Follow up with either Suavecito Bay Rum After Bath or Suavecito Menthol Vanishing Crème to top off your timeless experience!

8oz

name: Suavecito Pomade Original Hold
description:
This Pomade grips your hair like wax, but is water soluble. Washes out just like a hair gel (the best of both worlds!) The product contains a unique scent that has proven to be extremely admirable by males and females alike! It smells very clean. Works perfect on classic, modern, retro and old-school styles with a strong hold that lasts all day.

Add a little bit of water during application for a hair-style that has that "wet" look. You will be pleased when you discover how effortlessly this product washes out in the shower!

4oz

name: Suavecito Pomade Firme Strong Hold
description:
What American Shave says:
Here you have a great product that is water based with a great hold and shine. Hold down that slick back, pompadore, or parted look with this! NO FLAKES, GREAT SMELL!

		
What Suavecito says:	
Our NEW generation of water-based pomade. All the same great features of our original Suavecito Pomade but with a deadlier grip! Lasts longer and holds tighter! People have been begging for it and now it is finally here!

Specially formulated for those harder-to-hold styles.

Your hair will thank you. 

This Pomade grips your hair like wax, but is water soluble. Washes out just like a hair gel (the best of both worlds!) The product contains a unique scent that has proven to be extremely admirable by males and females alike! It smells very clean. Works perfect on classic, modern, retro and old-school styles with a strong hold that lasts all day.

Add a little bit of water during application for a hair-style that has that "wet" look. You will be pleased when you discover how effortlessly this product washes out in the shower!

4oz

name: Crown Soothing After Shave Lotion
description:
This light non oily, non greasy lotion penetrates the skin quickly to calm and sooth newly shaven skin. Nourishes and hydrates while restoring the skin’s PH level.

Contains: Aloe Juice, Coconut Oil, Glycerin, Witch Hazel, Vitamin E, Jojoba Oil, Black Willowbark Extract, Rosemary.

8oz

name: Crown Shaving Creme
description:
A rich, silky cream using only the finest ingredients available. The scent of eucalyptus and spearmint is sure to awaken your senses. This shave cream will provide you with a close, comfortable shave while leaving your skin feeling nourished and refreshed. Can be used with a shaving brush to generate a rich lather or can be massaged onto skin with fingers.

Contains: Glycerin, Shea Butter, Spearmint Leaf Oil, White Tea Leaf Extract, White Ginger Extract, Licorice Root Extract, Olive Leaf Extract, Maritime Pine Bark Extract, Pomegranate Extract, Rosemary Leaf Extract, Cocoa Extract, Grape Seed Extract.

8oz

name: Crown Shaving Beard Balm
description:
This light beard balm when rubbed into the beard area will help soften, ad slight sheen and Freshen up facial hair.

Contains: Aloe juice, orange blossom neroli distillate, shea butter, glycerin, sweet almond oil.

4oz

name: Crown Shaving Supreme Glide Shave Formula
description:
Enriched with botanical extracts, this non greasy non oily pre shave formula when applied prior to shave cream will help to prep the skin by softening beard hair and providing a slick surface to increase razor glide. Will help to reduce razor burn, nick’s and cuts.

Contains: Aloe juice, Meadowfoam Seed, Bilberry Extract, Sugar Maple, Orange Fruit Extract, Cranberry Extract, Glycerin & Essential oils.

8oz

name: AMERICAN SHAVE T-SHIRT GREY
description: Now you can rock the logo that's known world wide!  Show your American Shave pride and order this 100% Cotton Pre-Shrunk T for yourself today!

name: AMERICAN SHAVE Pre-Shave Oil
description:
Organic Pre-Shave Oil

This organic blend is made of organic safflower oil, organic castor oil, grape seed oil and Vitamin E.  

Rub a small portion on palm and distribute along face for a smooth shave.

Rubbing oil will allow for pores to open and hair to stand tall for a closer shave.

description: Want to add gratuity?  Add $5 to your order. Want to add $10? Add $5 twice or more to equal your desired amount. Please specify at time of checkout.

name: SHORT SEXY HAIR HARD UP
description: Use on dry hair for a messy, tousled look, and on wet hair for a sleek, sculpted effect.  Provides strong hold and intense shine.  Shine factor: 9, hold factor 9,  based on our new rating scale of 1 to 10.

name: SHORT SEXY HAIR ROCKED OUT
description: Apply to dry or damp hair for second-day style, added conditioning and light hold. Shine factor: 3; hold factor:3,  based on our new rating scale of 1 to 10.

name: SHORT SEXY HAIR CONTROL MANIAC
description: Use on dry hair to create strong shapes and provide optimum control, definition and firm, all-day hold. Shine factor: 5; hold factor: 8, based on our new rating scale of 1 to 10.
